___relationship_type.description: A controlled term specifying the relationship between experiments.
___relationship_type.title: Relationship Type

___biosample_quantity_units.description: The units that go along with the biological sample quantity
___biosample_quantity_units.title: Biosample Quantity Units

___follows_sop.description: Flag to indicate if the 4DN SOP for the selected type of experiment was followed - Yes or No
___follows_sop.title: Follows SOP

___protocol_variation.description: Protocol Documents Describing the variations in the protocol from reference.
___protocol_variation.title: Protocol Documents

items.description: A document associated with the specific experimental protocol.
items.title: Document

___files.description: Information about the data files associated with the experiment.
___files.title: Data Files

___description.description: A short description of the experiment
___description.title: Description

___authentication_docs.description: Images or Documents that authenticate the experiment - eg. gel picture
___authentication_docs.title: Authentication Documents

___filesets.description: Information about a set of data files associated with the experiment.
___filesets.title: Sets of Data Files

items.description: Metadata on a set of files.
items.title: Fileset

___reference_files.description: Reference files associated with this experiment (ex. file of sequencing barcodes).
___reference_files.title: Reference Files

___biosample_quantity.description: The amount of starting Biological sample going into the experiment
___biosample_quantity.title: Biosample Quantity

___quality_metric_flags.description: Flags and associated info for flagging experiments with possible issues
___quality_metric_flags.title: Quality Metric Flags

items.description: A flag for this experiment with link to associated QC info.
items.title: Flag

___experiment_type.description: A controlled term specifying the type of experiment.
___experiment_type.title: Experiment Type

___processed_files.description: Processed files that are derived from files in this experiment.
___processed_files.title: Processed Files
